title: in game fps drope/breaks
body:
I play league for a long time and this problem never happaned. I played the game on windows 7 version, with solid 70+fps with most of my options on high. But since last week i decided to upgrade my computer to windows 10 and the problem started. In game i still play with the same fps, but suddenly my game breaks for 10 sec sometimes or even more, or the fps drops to 3 or 4, with the same settings.
I already tried with lower settings but the problem keep going. I reinstalled windows , league but the problem continues and it's only with leauge.
ty for your time

replies.body: It sounds like your computer is having problems rendering game files, and causing the game to stutter.  A fix for this could be as simple as updating your drivers, but I recommend using our[ FPS Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for a full step of troubleshooting steps.  Let me know if you continue to have issues afterwards, and we can take another look!
